mapper.select: SELECT s.stu_id, stu_pwd, stu_name, stu_iden_num, stu_email, stu_phone, stu_grades, m.m_name, m.m_no, m.m_uni FROM registration r join course c on(r.co_code=c.co_code) join student s on (r.stu_id=s.stu_id) join procourse pc on (pc.co_code=c.co_code) join major m on (m.m_no=c.m_no) join professor p on (p.pro_id=pc.pro_id) WHERE r.co_code=#{coCode}
